list.description: CRM systems offer a range of benefits, from managing projects and campaigns to giving you mobile access to your data while you are on the go.
items: Precision targeted marketing campaigns - Detailed analytics give you indepth insights into your customers' purchase behaviour and relations data
Big data - Organis and manage large volumes of leads and data points effortlessly
Customer Profiles - Build and segment your own customer database
Visual data - Make impactful presentations with easy access to visual data points
Cultivate relations - Set reminders for customer milestones, such as anniversaries, to send personalised messages
Effective remarketing capabilities - Track customer purchase history to notify them about similar products
Know your ROI - Indepth reporting on sales performance allows for calculation of your Return on Investment

options.body: This option is suitable for large organisations with more flexible budgets. The CRM software us installed onto your network by an engineer from your software provider.
options.title: On-site CRM

items: CRM database is stored locally
CRM software runs on your own hardware and is managed internally
No database size limitation
Expanded options for integration with other applicaitons
Flexibility to determine when you want to upgrade

options.body: A flexible option; this type of CRM system works well for small to medium companies as data is stored on the cloud - reducing software installation, hardware and maintenance costs. You only pay for the amount of data you use and the number of users.
options.title: Cloud Based CRM

items: Data is stored online but is secured and private to you
Subscription fee enable lower and start-up costs
Get up and running quickly
Fast, reliable and scalabale environment
No hardware or IT infrastructure required
No software maintenance or backup costs
No software license costs

options.body: CRM applications can be downloaded on different operating systems, depending on the software provider. Gain access to your data from anywhere and at anytime through a mobile app. This can be an invaluable tool for the sales teams out in the field.

items: Easy to use with little installation or setup

Have the data at hand to support your responses whilst in meetings
compatible with both on-site and cloud systems
